manifest.name: Tag Buddy
manifest.description: Unlock powerful tag editing features in Reading Mode. Add, remove, and edit tags across your vault, in the active note or a single instance. Use tag summaries to roundup and process tagged content like an inbox.
manifest.author: David Fasullo

data.manifestValue: Unlock powerful tag editing features in Reading Mode. Add, remove, and edit tags across your vault, in the active note or a single instance. Use tag summaries to roundup and process tagged content like an inbox.
data.communityListValue: Add, edit, and remove tags in reading mode. Copy, move, or edit tagged blocks in reading and edit mode.
